    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void announce(ZToolAddress16 senderAddress, ZToolAddress64 ieeeAddress, ZToolAddress16 networkAddress, int capabilitiesBitmask)

    • Method Detail

      • announce

        void announce(ZToolAddress16 senderAddress,
            ZToolAddress64 ieeeAddress,
            ZToolAddress16 networkAddress,
            int capabilitiesBitmask)
        Callback invoked when an Annunce message arrives
        Parameters:
        senderAddress - the network address of the node which sent the Annunce message
        ieeeAddress - the 64-bit address of the node that is the subject of the Annunce message
        networkAddress - the network address assigned to the node that is the subject of the Annunce message
        capabilitiesBitmask - the bitmask identifying the network capibility of the node that is the subject of the Annunce message
